title: cidambaranai digambaranai
sahitya:
cidambaranai digambaranai gangAdharanai haranai ninai manamE


anupallavi

 madanai erittavanai shUlanai kAlanai kAlAl udaittavanai kuLir malai nAthanai


caraNam    aravu aNindavanai ambuli pUNDavanai turavu mA mannanai (shivanai) turiyam kaDandavanai 
maraiyuLLa maindavanai marai poruLAnavanai iraivanai paramanai param Agi ninravanai
